channel.title: Need help giving spawn rights
channel.description:
One of the things you can donate for in my server is spawn rights. Only problem is, I don't know how to give the spawn rights to just certain players and not all players. I also want to make it so that the people that have those spawn rights can't trade or drop.
This is a hybridpvp source, so I believe its PI. Can anyone help?

item.title: Need help giving spawn rights
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
				}

its the normal:
0=player
1=mod
2=admin
3=owner
4=donor

but remember i want only the specific donor to have the rights

Read full topic

item.title: Need help giving spawn rights
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

Change the rights of the command… Give me the raw command that you have. Oh and what are the rights for Donor/Admin/Owner?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help giving spawn rights
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

Well the ::item #### ## code is in there, but I need to make it so that only the owner, admins, and the player who donated have the ability to spawn. I’ve been searching all over, and messing with the codes in the server-side but nothing is seeming to work.
Any more ideas?

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

::givedonor?
There must be a command already if it was built in…
